nodes.text: A commando was an elite soldier who specialized in environments or situations that were beyond the capacity of normal infantry men. Examples included the Galactic Senate's Senate Commandos, the Grand Army of the Republic's clone commandos, and Maul's Mandalorian super commandos. The Separatist Droid Army designed its BX-series droid commandos to serve as commando-level battle droids. During the Galactic Empire's reign, death troopers served as special-assignment commandos.
